Trinity/Windlord/.


"Ohhhhh" said Trinity "Who's the bot that come with you???"

"A new friend kitty-bot..."answered Windlord "I think that he could 
stay wiht us..." Windlord "What was you doing while I was outside, 
kitty-bot? "

"I was dinning" replied Trinity "Nightlight found the dinning room of 
the ship..."
